description_text: Is there a way to make your 7 speed shifter a sequential one

conversations.body_text: Hi James Agar,  Your order number usually cannot be modified.

Sorry that's not what I meant
, I mean is there a modification for your sim racing shifter with 7 gears
and reverse to make it a sequential gearbox instead of a H pattern.
Hi James Agar,  Your current shifter uses a Hall sensor, so it can’t be modified into a sequential type through DIY. Please provide your order information, so I can help you confirm the exact model.
